resources.string: DRM content not supported on API levels below 18

Enable auto resuming videos while play back
Notifications permissions is required to send updates of anime released on kickass anime.\n\nThis works by pinging the server every hour or so to check if animes released or not.
As you have not allowed notifications pemission, you won\'t be reciving anime release updates
